alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 5:16PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Benton, northwestern Carroll and northern Washington Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 516 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles east of Gateway to 6 miles west of Tontitown. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Rogers... Bentonville... Bella Vista... Lowell... Farmington... Pea Ridge... Prairie Grove... Tontitown... Lincoln... Cave Springs... Greenland... Highfill... Garfield... Gateway... Beaver... Northwest Arkansas Regional Air... Cincinnati... War Eagle... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 58 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
